items.title: Black Friday 2025 deal schedule: Best Buy, Amazon, Costco, LEGO, Walmart, more [Updated]
items.summary:
The 2025 Black Friday deal season is upon us and early details from the major retailers are starting to flood in. This year we are already getting official confirmation from many of the biggest retailers and brands on when you can expect the Black Friday and Thanksgiving deals to begin and it looks like we are going to be getting a full month worth of big-time discounts in 2025. Deals are actually kicking off on October 31 this year and carrying right through to Thanksgiving 2025 and Black Friday with various sale events throughout the month of November.

items.summary:

The all-new Best of 9to5Toys collects all of the most notable deals and organizes them neatly into one handy catalog for you to peruse every Saturday morning. items.title: 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly – Early Black Friday deals now live, Samsung Odyssey and Smart Monitors up to $950 off, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly – your go-to spot for the notable deals and latest releases in PC gaming at a glance every Saturday morning. Best Buy’s early Black Friday doorbusters are now live, offering huge discounts on gaming gear including monitors, laptops, and accessories. Woot’s Samsung monitor sale is still live with fresh lows on both Odyssey gaming and Smart Monitor models. We’re also tracked some solid deals on a bunch of other peripherals, including the Backbone Pro controller grip, Logitech gaming mice, and more, and they’re all waiting for you down below in this week’s Battlestation Weekly.

items.title: Electrified Weekly – Tenways Wayfarer e-bike with $577 savings at $1,899, Anker SOLIX C2000 Gen 2 power station up to 50% off, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Electrified Weekly – the best place to find all of this week’s best deals and new releases to electrify your life and protect Mother Nature. It’s been an incredible week for Green Deals following the previous week’s lead, with Halloween Sales offering up big savings on e-bikes and power stations, specifically. It was also another week of noteworthy releases, as we have Tenways launching its new Wayfarer e-bike with a $300 price cut and $277 in FREE add-on gear at $1,899 alongside Anker’s launch of the SOLIX C2000 Gen 2 Portable Power Station and bundles with up to 50% savings starting from $749. There’s plenty more e-bike sales, hangover Halloween deals on power stations, and even some early Black Friday events – plus, plenty more, so head on down below and check out the collection of Green Deals we have for you from over this week.

more…

During the last week of October reader favorites ranged from this standout Milanese Loop-style Apple Watch band at $10 to a smartphone lanyard that doubles as a USB-C cable for $7, and finally, these corduroy sweatshirts priced from $18.50. items.title: Lenovo’s budget-friendly 2025 Idea Tab Plus Android tablet with 90Hz display hits new $200 all-time low, more from $130
items.summary:
As part of its now live early Black Friday sale, Best Buy is offering a handful of Lenovo Android tablets at some of the best prices we have tracked for them. One of the more notable deals of the lot gets you the brand’s 2025 Idea Tab Plus Android tablet for $199.99 shipped. This particular model hit the scene earlier this year carrying a $290 price tag, and this unit here without the included Lenovo Pen typically goes for $270. Today’s deal at Best Buy takes $70 off its usual going rate, to mark the lowest price we have tracked for it. Alternatively, you can score the variant with an included stylus for $219.99 shipped from Lenovo. A handful of other Lenovo Android tablets are also discounted right now at both Best Buy and directly at Lenovo, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

more…

Now that Halloween has led us into November, access to LEGO’s newest building sets are opening up for Insiders ahead of general release in the coming days. This month is more focused on the upcoming Insiders Weekend and Black Friday events, and as such we’re only seeing two sets – plus some GWPs – stocking the shelves, but boy are they heavy hitters. You can head down below to get a rundown on these new sets and the available GWP sets that are accompanying them for November 2025.
